concept.title: Manual for Surviving College
concept.shortdesc: College is a time for change. You're encountering new people, new ideas, and a whole new location. It is understandable to be hesitant when you think about stepping out into this new world, even when you want to break free of your high school life and be involved. This guide will walk you through some of the more common situations you will encounter, and give you the best advice for tackling these situations.

conbody.p: So get out there and enjoy Virginia Tech!
